headline.main: For Palestinians, Social Media Is Source of News _ and Anger
headline.print_headline: For Palestinians, Social Media Is Source of News _ and Anger

docs.snippet: Four dailies, eight TV stations, and scores of radio stations report on the current wave of Israeli-Palestinian violence in the Palestinian territories. But they are background noise for many Palestinian youth, whose No. 1 source of news comes fro...
docs.lead_paragraph: Four dailies, eight TV stations, and scores of radio stations report on the current wave of Israeli-Palestinian violence in the Palestinian territories. But they are background noise for many Palestinian youth, whose No. 1 source of news comes from Facebook groups that pump out a minute-by-minute stream of bloody images and pro-violence slogans.

headline.main: Lebanon's Hezbollah Takes Aim at Saudi Arabia on Ashura
headline.print_headline: Lebanon's Hezbollah Takes Aim at Saudi Arabia on Ashura

docs.snippet: Supporters of Lebanon's Iran-allied Shi'ite group Hezbollah chanted "Death to the Saud family" as their leader railed against Sunni-led Saudi Arabia on Saturday in a sign of deepening hostility towards the U.S.-allied kingdom....
docs.lead_paragraph: Supporters of Lebanon's Iran-allied Shi'ite group Hezbollah chanted "Death to the Saud family" as their leader railed against Sunni-led Saudi Arabia on Saturday in a sign of deepening hostility towards the U.S.-allied kingdom.

headline.main: Two More Iranian Fighters Killed in Syria: FARS
headline.print_headline: Two More Iranian Fighters Killed in Syria: FARS

docs.snippet: Two members of a unit of Iran's elite Revolutionary Guards Corps (IRGC) have been killed in Syria, Fars news agency reported on Saturday, a day after confirming two other IRGC deaths in Syria....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two members of a unit of Iran's elite Revolutionary Guards Corps (IRGC) have been killed in Syria, Fars news agency reported on Saturday, a day after confirming two other IRGC deaths in Syria.

headline.main: Ayotte Crafts Herself as Independent Voice in Senate Contest
headline.print_headline: Ayotte Crafts Herself as Independent Voice in Senate Contest

docs.snippet: Long a rising star within the Republican party, U.S. Sen. Kelly Ayotte is now touting her bipartisan credentials as she faces a challenge from Democratic Gov. Maggie Hassan in a race that could help determine control of the Senate....
docs.lead_paragraph: Long a rising star within the Republican party, U.S. Sen. Kelly Ayotte is now touting her bipartisan credentials as she faces a challenge from Democratic Gov. Maggie Hassan in a race that could help determine control of the Senate.

headline.main: Flights Between Russia and Ukraine to Stop Due to Sanctions
headline.print_headline: Flights Between Russia and Ukraine to Stop Due to Sanctions

docs.snippet: Flights between Russia and Ukraine will be terminated on Sunday after the countries exchanged sanctions against their airlines amid a standoff over Moscow's support of separatists in the east of Ukraine....
docs.lead_paragraph: Flights between Russia and Ukraine will be terminated on Sunday after the countries exchanged sanctions against their airlines amid a standoff over Moscow's support of separatists in the east of Ukraine.

headline.main: Venezuela Prosecutor Who Accused Lopez Flees Country: Report
headline.print_headline: Venezuela Prosecutor Who Accused Lopez Flees Country: Report

docs.snippet: A Venezuelan state prosecutor who helped lead charges against opposition leader Leopoldo Lopez has fled the country and accused the socialist government of pressing him to use false evidence to unfairly condemn Lopez, local media reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Venezuelan state prosecutor who helped lead charges against opposition leader Leopoldo Lopez has fled the country and accused the socialist government of pressing him to use false evidence to unfairly condemn Lopez, local media reported.

headline.main: Georgia Man Faces Prison Again for Stealing Sea Turtle Eggs
headline.print_headline: Georgia Man Faces Prison Again for Stealing Sea Turtle Eggs

docs.snippet: Less than two years after he was released from prison, Lewis Jackson found authorities waiting for him as he boarded a ferry boat on remote Sapelo Island carrying a cooler full of contraband valued by some as a mythical aphrodisiac....
docs.lead_paragraph: Less than two years after he was released from prison, Lewis Jackson found authorities waiting for him as he boarded a ferry boat on remote Sapelo Island carrying a cooler full of contraband valued by some as a mythical aphrodisiac.

headline.main: Huge Inflow of Migrants Into Slovenia Continues Despite Cold Weather
headline.print_headline: Huge Inflow of Migrants Into Slovenia Continues Despite Cold Weather

docs.snippet: A huge inflow of migrants and refugees to Slovenia continued on Saturday as thousands of people arrived to the tiny Alpine state on their way to Austria and Germany....
docs.lead_paragraph: A huge inflow of migrants and refugees to Slovenia continued on Saturday as thousands of people arrived to the tiny Alpine state on their way to Austria and Germany.

headline.main: Sharapova Set for WTA Finals in Singapore
headline.print_headline: Sharapova Set for WTA Finals in Singapore

docs.snippet: Maria Sharapova hasn't played a whole match since Wimbledon but the Russian believes she's healthy enough to compete Sunday at the season-ending WTA Finals....
docs.lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova hasn't played a whole match since Wimbledon but the Russian believes she's healthy enough to compete Sunday at the season-ending WTA Finals.
